Package index

All functions

climate_data
Historical and Future Summer Temperature Data in North America
cma()
Construct CMA Confidence Intervals via Parametric Method
expit()
Expit (Inverse Logit) Function
mean_response_predict()
Functional Outcome Regression Prediction with Group-Specific Inference
plot_cs()
Plot Inversion of Simultaneous Confidence Intervals (SCIs) into Inner and Outer Confidence Sets (CSs)
prepare_pupil_fpca()
Prepare Pupil FPCA Dataset
pupil
Trajectories of Pupil Response to Light after Cannabis Use
SCB_functional_outcome()
Construct Simultaneous Confidence Bands (SCB) For One Dimensional Functional Data
SCB_gls_climate()
Construct Simultaneous Confidence Bands for a Spatial Generalized Least Square Model
SCB_linear_outcome()
Construct Simultaneous Confidence Bands for a Linear Regression Model
SCB_logistic_outcome()
Construct Simultaneous Confidence Bands for a Logistic Regression Model
SCB_regression_coef()
Construct Simultaneous Confidence Bands for Regression Coefficients
scb_to_cs()
Construct Simultaneous Confidence Sets for Excursion/Interval Sets from Simultaneous Confidence Bands
